      private java.lang.String getAppendedString​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> args) throws IllegalMessageFormException
      Method transforms console arguments to a single string from position 2
      Parameters:
      args - console arguments
      Returns:
      unified console arguments
      Throws:
      IllegalMessageFormException - if input is incorrect

    • checkInputForm

      private java.util.List<java.lang.String> checkInputForm​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> input) throws IllegalMessageFormException
      Method checks input to find illegal characters
      Parameters:
      input - String containing message to be processed
      Returns:
      true if input is correct
      Throws:
      IllegalMessageFormException - if input is incorrect

    • translate

      public java.lang.String translate​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> input, int key) throws IllegalMessageFormException
      Method encodes or decodes a message passed to the program
      Parameters:
      input - a message to be encoded or decoded
      key - an integral value being the alphabetical shift distance of the code
      Returns:
      encoded or decoded message
      Throws:
      IllegalMessageFormException - if input is incorrect
